title: Chao Bian Zhan Tuo 2 Bao Jia Zhan Tuo
synopsis: After decades of development, Explosive Armor Battle Tuo duel has become one of the most popular sports in the world. At this time, the "Ultimate Feast" Invitational Tournament of Explosive Armored Warriors began. The protagonist Chen Xing is invited to the mysterious island together with other top warlords in the world to embark on a survival adventure. During the adventure, Chen Xing not only relied on his determination to guard the weak and gained recognition to unlock the power of the sacred beast, but also got acquainted with Ye Kong, a low-key expert who came here to find his brother, and the "perfect warrior" Le Zhengyang who wanted to prove to his father. . However, this "ultimate feast" is just a conspiracy of the organizer Stawan! He wants to use the warlords to awaken the evil forces in the island to destroy the world! The Chenxing trio stepped forward and tried their best to defeat Stawan. After the "ultimate feast", the three formed a dragon team to launch a sprint towards the championship team and the honor of the Explosive Zantuo King in the quadrennial Explosive Zantuo King Competition. Just one step from the highest honor was left after the trio of thorns and thorns. In the distant future, Stawan, who wanted to destroy the world, made a comeback... (translated from iqiyi)
